Description: The path to the match table database (as generated by the source matching process).
Enable or disable the Poisson mapping sub-process. Default is False. If enabled, then the ``POISSON_PARAMS`` header must be present.
Enable or disable the Instrumental sub-process. Default is False, If enable, then ``INSTRUMENT_PARAMS`` must be a header.
Enable or disable the object type matching sub-process. Default is False. If enabled, then ``OBJECT_PARAMS`` must be a header.
The path to the original catalog table. This is used to add special columns (specified by the user) into the dataset.
